IIntegralImage

Interface to an integral image (see https://​en​.wikipedia​.org​/wiki​/Summed-area_table)

GetSum

int channel,
int x1,
int y1,

int y2
) = 0

Returns the sum of the requested area

Parameters
channel
int

which color channel to sum

int

y1
int

x2
int

y2
int
